data.title: Meet the Director: Wylie Anderson ("How to Cry on Command")
data.meta_description: Wylie Anderson is a director, writer & actor based in Los Angeles. She is represented by Brillstein Entertainment Partners, and she’s studied at both Emerson College and Upright Citizens Brigade. Up next, you can see Wylie’s award-winning short film How to Cry on Command, which is out now, or starring in Watershed Motion Picture’s Chasing Oslo, which is coming soon.
